event.summary: 09/03/1993: In Israel, an Israeli Defence Forces (IDF) soldier was killed and another injured when their vehicle was shot at by HAMAS gunmen waiting in a car on a roadside in the Hebron area. No other injuries or fatalities were reported.
event.target1: Military Jeep carrying 2 IDF soldiers (Sgt. Zion Elkobi killed)
event.propcomment: The military jeep flipped off of the road after the driver was killed in the attack.
event.scite1: “Killing of IDF Soldier Near Hebron Will ‘Not Affect Peace Process,'" BBC Summary of World Broadcasts, September 4, 1993.
event.scite2: “Gunmen Kill IDF Soldier in Ambush Near Hebron," The Jerusalem Post, September 3, 1993.
event.scite3: “Palestinian Gunmen Kill Israeli Soldier," United Press International, September 3, 1993.
